overview:
Michael Leeds is the Founder and CEO of IntroRocket, Inc.

Customers describe IntroRocket as “Social Networking for Business.”

IntroRocket is a service integrated with Salesforce, LinkedIn, and Facebook that provides co-workers with a company-level view of contacts, automatic discovery of connections to business prospects, and single-click ability to collaborate with colleagues for critical insights and personal introductions to help close more deals.

Get started free @ www.IntroRocket.com.
